divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving south on Highway 84 at or near Puerto de Luna. It looked to my wife and I as if it was something burning up on reentry. The first part broke into 5 or so pieces rather bright lasting around 30 seconds. The second part was a single glow that was much brighter. The altitude and angle of the object was extremely distant and high. The color was a bright orange like shade. The event occurred about a hands distance from the moon and Venus to the south at about 3 o'clock visually (if you were to hold your hand about 1 foot from your eyes).
Summary: Looked like something burning up reentering the atmosphere in 2 seperate visuals.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Santa Rosa
There were no other sightings in Santa Rosa on or around August 5th 2009
